description: A two-story minimalist 5BHK cottage designed for a joint family. The design integrates floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, embraces Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow, and adheres to local building norms. Ground floor includes an entrance hall, living room, dining room, kitchen, and servant's quarters; first floor comprises master bedroom, three additional bedrooms, a guest/extra bedroom, and a dedicated library.
